tiles.name: Incident Details By Management Zone and their Severities, Impacted Entities and MTTR
Markdown
tiles.markdown: Total incidents (problem open > configured problem transition time)

tiles.name: Markdown
tiles.markdown:
## Severity Definition  

**Availability**:  
These indicate high-severity incidents within your environment, such as a complete outage or unavailability of servers or processes. These should be treated as P1.  

**Error**:  
Error events indicate increased error rates or other error-related incidents that interfere with the regular operation within an entity.  

**Slowdown**:  
Slowdown events indicate a decrease of performance in one of the operational services or applications.  

**Resource**:  
Resource events indicate resource contention like CPU-usage, CPU-saturation, etc.  


**Custom**:  
Custom-type indicate any alerts generated on user-defined thresholds.  



***More details*** in our [help documentation](https://www.dynatrace.com/support/help/shortlink/event-types)

tiles.name: Markdown
tiles.markdown:
## Impacted Entities   

**Environment**:  
Any incident that has downtime at environment-level. An example would be none of the oneAgents are able to reach out to the cluster (due to environment-wide network downtime). 

**Infrastructure**:  
Any incident that were opened which were a result of an anomaly at infra-level.  

**Service**:  
Any incident that were opened which were a result of an anomaly at services.  


**Application**:  
Any incident that were opened which were a result of an anomaly at application-level. Incidents at application-level typically leads to **business impact** (as it possibly could impact users connecting the application).

tiles.name: Markdown
tiles.markdown:
Incidents generated sliced by Management Zone  

Table details:  
1. mgmt_zone: Name of the management zone.  
2. Total Incidents: Incidents generated within that management zone.  
3. MTTR With RCA (mins): Mean time to resolution when there is a RCA available.  
4. MTTR without RCA (mins): Mean Time to Resolution when Davis AI could not identify RCA (possibly due to limited visibility).

tiles.name: Markdown
tiles.markdown:
**Table Legend**:  

1. **mgmt_zone**: Name of the management zone.  

2. **Total Incidents**: Incidents generated within that management zone.  

3. **Incident with Davis AI RCA**: Incidents reported with Davis AI RCA available.  

3. **MTTR With RCA (mins)**: Mean time to resolution when there is a Davis AI provided RCA available.  

4. **MTTR without RCA (mins)**: Mean Time to Resolution when Davis AI did not identify RCA (possibly due to limited visibility).

tiles.name: Incidents generated and root cause by management zone
